name: Purple Sage Ventures
description: Purple Sage Ventures focuses on investing in changemakers with a clear focus and purpose. They prioritize underrepresented founders, recognizing the value and superior outcomes diverse teams can achieve. The firm provides strategic input and support to early-stage companies, guiding them through chaotic phases towards growth. Their investment philosophy is rooted in supporting entrepreneurial journeys that yield significant societal impacts alongside financial returns.
portfolio_companies: Character, Epicured, Guava, Health in Her HUE, Inclusively, Juno Health, Keep Company, Pratt Standard, Realworld, Renewal Mill, Sendspark, Sprezz, TO THE MARKET, Tailored Industry, Trusty.care

professional_info.investment_verticals: Impactful products & services that innovate supply chains, increase business and personal productivity, and reimagine wellness.
professional_info.investment_thesis: Supporting underrepresented founders who are undervalued and underfunded, believing diverse teams produce better results.
professional_info.value_add: High-level strategic input, structure around challenges, guidance, support, access to networks, knowledge, and capital.
